scripts.build: npm run optimize-images && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-css: npx cleancss -o css/main.min.css css/main.css && npx cleancss -o css/styles.min.css css/revelate-styles.css css/styles.css css/home.css css/about.css css/approach.css css/services.css css/case-studies.css
scripts.minify-js: npx terser js/main.js js/animations.js js/navigation.js js/components.js -o js/bundle.min.js
scripts.lint: npx stylelint css/*.css && npx eslint js/*.js
